Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,MediaMaker> mediaMakers

      java.util.ArrayList<Movie> movies
      ArrayList containing all available searchable Movie objects

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void insertMediaMaker(MediaMaker mm)
      This method will take in a MediaMaker object and insert it into the class variable mediaMakers, getting the key from the MediaMaker object's getName method
      void insertMovie(Movie m)
      This method will take in a Movie object and insert it into the class variable movies for later searching
      void insertSeries(Series s)
      This method will take in a Series object and insert it into the class variable series for later searching
      static Database readDatabase(java.lang.String file)
      This method will utilize the Serializable interface and read a specified file containing a Database object and putting the read in Database into a newly created Database, which will then be returned
      static void writeDatabase(Database d, java.lang.String file)
      This method will utilize the Serializable interface and write the Database object into a specified file

      • readDatabase

        public static Database readDatabase(java.lang.String file)
        This method will utilize the Serializable interface and read a specified file containing a Database object and putting the read in Database into a newly created Database, which will then be returned
        Parameters:
        file - File from which to read from
        Returns:
        The read in Database object
